title: Partisan That Gives 2989's Ability

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Contact a player each night. You may send them a <25 character message. This ability resolves immediately.
- During the day, idealise a player who you have contacted three or more times, granting them one use of 2989: Proponent's first ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All messages sent by you appear to be sent by “The Voice of the Sun”.
- Whenever a player uses an ability you grant, they commit suicide.

desc:
Post 2994
*Y— Yeah, what the Herald said! The sun's, like, r— real neat, y'know!*
